recommendations.reason: Having two files causes confusion - merge complete version into main .env.example
Many variables have inconsistent names (LOGS_DIR vs LOG_DIR, GCS_BUCKET vs GCS_BUCKET_NAME)

recommendations.action: Add environment variable validation on startup
recommendations.reason: Services fail silently when required vars are missing
Many vars used in docker-compose files are not in .env.example
Each service has unique requirements - service-specific examples would be clearer
Critical secrets like private keys should not be in environment variables
VERCEL_TOKEN, CLOUD_RUN_SERVICE_ACCOUNT, etc. are documented but not used
Automate checking for missing required variables before deployment
